combatSkills.name: Cleaving Advance
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Ultra Fire M.Attack Dmg.+40% per each [Self] Mag. & Fire Attack Dmg. Buff Skill and [Foe] removes Str. & Mag. Buffs exc. Assist Skills

combatSkills.name: Flare Hammer
combatSkills.description: [Allies] Increase S.A Gauge Charge gain by 33% & Mag., Dex., and Fire Attack Dmg.+30%/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Blade Flash
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Fast Hi Fire M.Attack & Dmg. received (Attack Type: All and Single Targets)+20%/3 turns

combatSkills.name: Extinguishment

passiveSkills.name: Fire Manifestation
passiveSkills.description: Wind Resist+25%. When countering and attacking, regular M.Attack a Foe with Fire Element.
